Thu Dec 28 02:56:20 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://www.gnupg.org/ftp/gcrypt/gnupg/gnupg-2.4.3.tar.bz2
ğŸš echo a271ae6d732f6f4d80c258ad9ee88dd9c94c8fdc33c3e45328c4d7c126bd219d  gnupg-2.4.3.tar.bz2
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf gnupg-2.4.3.tar.bz2
ğŸš cd gnupg-2.4.3
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/gnupg-2.4.3 --docdir=/opt/package/gnupg-2.4.3/share/doc/gnupg-2.4.3
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
